amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude any tract of Federal land where oil and gas leasing would decrease land and water available for outdoor recreation from the total increase in the percentage of Federal lands described in paragraph (1) leased for oil and gas production.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude any tract of Federal land where oil and gas leasing would decrease land and water available for outdoor recreation from the total increase in the percentage of Federal lands described in paragraph (1) leased for oil and gas production.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 225 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 225 (Roll no. 47).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
